target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: No findings were reported, so the target vulnerability was not identified.

notes: The audit incorrectly concluded the contract is safe. The withdraw function (lines 53-75) is vulnerable to ERC-777 reentrancy attacks because it transfers tokens (line 68) before updating the state balances (lines 71-72). This violates the Checks-Effects-Interactions pattern. An attacker can implement a malicious tokensToSend hook to recursively call withdraw before the balance is updated, allowing them to withdraw more than their deposited amount.
